auto-claude/.description: The actual backend directory is auto-claude/, not apps/backend/ as mentioned in spec. Requirements are at auto-claude/requirements.txt, core module is at auto-claude/core/

auto-claude/core/oauth.py.description: New OAuth module with PKCE generation. generate_pkce_pair() returns (verifier, challenge) tuple. Uses secrets.token_urlsafe(48) and Authlib create_s256_code_challenge. Configuration constants defined: OAUTH_CLIENT_ID, OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_ENDPOINT, OAUTH_TOKEN_ENDPOINT, OAUTH_REDIRECT_URI, OAUTH_SCOPES.
